La vertu du catholicon d Espagne
Satyre Ménippée

Chrestien, Florent, 1541-1596
Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia)
Gillot, Jacques, 1550?-1619
Le Roy, Jeanne, active 1581-1628

Pithou, Pierre, 1539-1596
Rapin, Nicolas, approximately 1540-1608
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Some early editions were published under title: La vertu du catholicon d'Espagne.
Supposed to have been inspired by Jean Le Roy. The different pieces are by Jacques Gillot, Florent Chrestien, Nicholas Rapin, Jean Passerat and Pierre Pithou.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Capé. Unidentified armorial bookplate (crest, with one tree). From the library of the Comte de Fresne, according to handwritten note. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 398.
